abilities.name: Falling Star
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is in your hand and your Bench isn’t full, you may move your Active Pokémon to your Bench and play this Pokémon as your new Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
